[center][b][size=6][color=Crimson]Description[/color][/size][/b]
This mod completely overhauls the current vampire system used in Skyrim and makes vampires 
like vampires from the Warhammer army \"Vampire Counts\".[/center] 
[line]

[center]

[b][color=Crimson][size=6]BECOMING A VAMPIRE[/size][/color][/b]
[img]http://www.troll.me/images/boromir/one-does-not-simply-become-a-vampire-by-sparkling.jpg[/img]

To become a vampire, you can no longer go to a vampire cave and contract a disease, as vampires are selfish, vain creatures and do not accidently bring new vampires into the world. In fact, if you wish to become a vampire, there are only 2 ways you can do it.

1. The first way would be to entreat a vampire to make you a vampire. (either do it through the dawnguard questline, or there will be a new questline to do this), but do not expect for them to turn you just because you want them to.

2. Re-create the corrupted elixir of life used by Neferata, the fist of the vampires. To do this, you will have to find the recipe written by Neferata many centuries ago and then hunt for the correct ingredients. (note - you can have alchemy 0 and still create the elixir).

[/center]
